v.v: God, act mercifully toward me because men are attacking me!
All day long my enemies seek to crush the life from me,
God, I praise you because you do what you have promised;
All day long my enemies claim that I said things that I did not say;
In order to cause trouble for me, they hide
So, God, punish them for the wicked things that they are doing;
You have counted all the times that I have been wandering alone;
When I call out to you, my God, my enemies will be defeated;
I praise you that you do what you have promised;
I trust in you, and as a result, I will not be afraid.
I will bring to you the offering that I promised;
because you have rescued me from being killed;

v: All day long an enemy presses closer and closer to me because they want to take my life.
there are many enemies attacking me!
I trust in you, and then I am not afraid.
Ordinary humans certainly cannot harm me!
they are always thinking of ways to harm me.
and watch everything that I do,
waiting for an opportunity to kill me.
show that you are angry by defeating those people!
it is as though you have put all my tears in a bottle
so that you can see how much I have cried.
You have counted my tears and written the number in your book.
I know that will happen because you are fighting for me.
Yahweh, I will always praise you for that.
I know that humans cannot really harm me!
I will bring an offering to you to thank you
you have kept me from stumbling.
And so I will continue to live with God every day
in his light that gives me life.
